directions: Stir hot espresso, half-and-half, brandy, amaretto, vanilla extract, hot chocolate mix, and sugar together in a saucepan over medium-low heat until the sugar dissolves; cook at a simmer until hot, 2 to 3 minutes. Pour into 4 mugs and top each with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.
ingredients: 4 teaspoons whipped cream, or to taste
1 teaspoon chocolate shavings, or to taste
title: Holiday Cappuccino
